definition[0]: used to say that someone is unable to change their behaviour or feelings, or to prevent themselves from doing something
example[0]: She couldn’t help it if she was being irrational.
example[1]: ‘Stop biting your nails.’ ‘I can’t help it.’
example[2]: I can’t help the way I feel about you.
example[3]: Lee could not help but agree with her.
example[4]: I can’t help feeling that there has been a mistake.
note[0]: somebody can’t help feeling/thinking/wondering etc something
example[5]: I couldn’t help thinking about the past.
